thread.title: BRIEF-Helix Biopharma Corp. Announces Regulatory Approval To Dose Patients In A Phase II Randomized Study of L-DOS47 With Vinorelbine And Cisplatin

title: BRIEF-Helix Biopharma Corp. Announces Regulatory Approval To Dose Patients In A Phase II Randomized Study of L-DOS47 With Vinorelbine And Cisplatin
text:
Market News April 10, 2018 / 11:47 AM / in 8 minutes BRIEF-Helix Biopharma Corp. Announces Regulatory Approval To Dose Patients In A Phase II Randomized Study of L-DOS47 With Vinorelbine And Cisplatin Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 10 (Reuters) - Helix Biopharma Corp: 
* HELIX BIOPHARMA CORP. ANNOUNCES REGULATORY APPROVAL TO DOSE PATIENTS IN A PHASE II RANDOMIZED STUDY OF L-DOS47 WITH VINORELBINE AND CISPLATIN 
* ALL NECESSARY REGULATORY AND ETHICS APPROVALS HAVE BEEN RECEIVED TO DOSE FIRST PATIENT IN ITS LDOS003 TRIAL IN UKRAINE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
